thread.title: Despite his protests from afar, Costantino played key role in 38 Studios courtship
thread.title_full: Despite his protests from afar, Costantino played key role in 38 Studios courtship - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Despite his protests from afar, Costantino played key role in 38 Studios courtship
text: Steven M. Costantino, a former House Finance Committee chairman, was more than a hundred miles away, working in Vermont’s state government, when newly disclosed public records and emails fueled a wave of recent headlines on the $75 million 38 Studios boondoggle. From the other side of the Green Mountains, he could feel the spotlight. The state’s financing of the upstart video-game [...]> ...
